name: What Goes Up... (Mythical Development)
description:
Gravity is no longer an issue with this fast paced shooter!

20 years after undergoing a deep sleep experiment, Private Ben Hutchins awakes from his pod to find himself not in the pristine lab where the experiment started, but in a deserted ruin, where the security systems mistake him as a hostile intruder.

Use your gravity reversal powers to dodge hostile robots, lasers and turrets as you make your way through a long abandoned laboratory, overcoming platforming challenges and taking out hostile security systems to reach the exit and regain your freedom.

Note: This was built as a Final year project for a games design course, meaning critical feedback would be much appreciated and can be provided either in a comment or in this simple form: https://forms.gle/YD8QyS3C2dBVLmPp6
